name: Split Apart (ThePenguinPrince)
description:
Split Apart is a short and very challenging platformer involving two parts of one spirit working together.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move
  • SPACE to jump, Light has double jump
  • LEFT SHIFT to dash, only Dark can do this (it's needed in order to beat the game)

Game by:

  • ThePenguinPrince: programmer, musician, level designer, sound designer, artist
  • Zedani: main artist, animator, sound designer
  • Kyma003: game designer, sound designer

Additional credits:

  • Get the font from here: https://www.dafont.com/alagard.font
